Name: My Stepmom is a Futanari Chemist
About the game: Futa on Male An unexpected turn of events has you stuck at home with your stepmom on your 21st birthday. She might be busy woman--being a successful chemist and all--yet still manages to find time for you on your special day. What would've been an evening packed with fun, soon turns into an awkward situation that goes beyond your wildest dreams... * This one is a doozy... Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. Gameplay Kinetic Visual Novel H-Scenes ~10K words Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
